title: (x) HELP Identifying this Font... - modified Kabel {Jeffrey P}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623041540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Active_6404.JPG)

Does anyone know what font was used for this?  
Thanks in advance. Ü
author: xsalt

comments.content:
Really close, but not quite... Kabel's lowercase e's too tilted.  
Hmmm... anyone else? Ü
Being it a logo, as it seems, tilting a letter would be the least modification to any font. Moreso if you see that (to me not so beautiful) e wouldn't work at that angle inside a word.
